subject: Presenting Mementoes to the officers/staff on their repatriation/superannuation/retirement.
text: Hay <riv TTTHf wfearrut TY4 Phane 91-11*25074100/25074200 (et @art ar TrTrTT TATTT4) S-f Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 W 6, %z-10, ERGT, # Rearit-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 15.03.2016 POLICY MATTERS ADMINISTRATION/FINANCE (172/2016) (Decision taken on File No. 11041/217/2007-Admn) Sub:   Presenting Mementoes to the officers/staff on their repatriation superannuation retirement: In recognition of the services rendered by the officers/staff with NHAI, it has been decided that officers staff leaving NHAI on their repatriation/retirement/ superannuation shall be presented mementoes, as per details given below: SLNo Place of To be presented to To be presented by posting_ 1 NHAI HQs On superannuation Of an Chairman officer/staff (regular term contractLof NHAI 2) NHAI HQs Relieving after serving on Concerned Member deputation with NHAI 3) Field On superannuation retirement of Concerned Regional Offices an officer staff (regular long Officer term contract) /Relieving after servingon deputation Field Office Regional Officer relieved on New Regional Officer deputation 5) Field Office On superannuation retirement of Chairman Regional officer (Regular Contract) 2 The mementoes on superannuation retirement for the officers/staff (regular- term contract) relieved from NHAI HQs shall be arranged by NHAI Club. For others af NHAI Hqs, the concerned General  Manager of the Division are delegated powers to procure mementoes costing not more than Rs.2000/- For field offices, the concerned Regional Officer are delegated powers to procure mementoes costing not more than Rs.2000/ 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI (A.K Sadhu) CGM (Coord:) To: AIl Officers & Employees of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. MMtM NHAL long Ilong
